original_title: Webinar on “Anti-Corruption Bill: The Role of the Corporate Sector”
original_body_lines: "Anti-Corruption Bill: The Role of the Coprorate Sector"  will be held on 28 April 2023 from 3:30 to 5:30 p.m. by Corporate Management Consultants.

This Bill provides for the establishment of an independent commission to detect and investigate allegations of Bribery and Corruption and offences relating to the declaration of assets and liabilities and associated offences that will direct institutions to prosecute offences of Bribery and Corruption.

This webinar is mainly for Directors and Senior Officials of Corporates, Directors and Senior Officials of Financial Institutions, Lawyers and Compliance officers, Accountants/Auditors, Company Secretaries etc.
How to prevent and eradicate bribery and corruption in order to meet the just requirements of the general welfare of a democratic society;
Enhance public confidence in Government and strengthen public participation to eradicate corruption;
The keynote will be delivered by Former Director General of the Bribery Commission and Senior Additional Solicitor General Sarath Jayamanne P.C.

The speakers will comprise of Fellow International Compliance Association (U.K.) and Former Chairman SEC and Insurance Regulatory Board Dr. D. C. Jayasuriya P.C., who served as Chairman of the Finance Ministry Advisory Committee to set up a Single Regulator for the Finance Industry and Legal Consultant/Counsel Harsha Fernando and Legal Consultant / Former DG SEC and Senior Advisor to the Ministry of Finance Malik Cader.
